title: 2 Men, Accused Of Killing Air India Bombing Suspect, Plead Guilty
content: Two men accused of killing Ripudaman Singh Malik, a Sikh man acquitted in the tragic 1985 Air India Kanishka terrorist bombing case, have pleaded guilty to second-degree murder in a Canadian court, according to media reports.
summary: Two men accused of killing Ripudaman Singh Malik, a Sikh man acquitted in the tragic 1985 Air India Kanishka terrorist bombing case, have pleaded guilty to second-degree murder in a Canadian court, according to media reports.

title: India-China Border Patrol Agreement: What It Means, Why It Is Important
content: In a significant diplomatic breakthrough four years after the Galwan Valley clash, India and China have reached a patrolling arrangement along the Line of Actual Control.
summary: In a significant diplomatic breakthrough four years after the Galwan Valley clash, India and China have reached a patrolling arrangement along the Line of Actual Control.

title: Watch: Trump's Heartfelt Interaction With Indian Couple At McDonald's
content: An Indian-origin couple's heartfelt interaction with former US President Donald Trump is going viral on social media.
summary: An Indian-origin couple's heartfelt interaction with former US President Donald Trump is going viral on social media.

title: Teen Kills Five Of Family At Home In US. Arrested: Police
content: Authorities in Washington state have taken a 15-year-old boy into custody in connection with a fatal shooting that claimed the lives of five people at a home near Seattle.
summary: Authorities in Washington state have taken a 15-year-old boy into custody in connection with a fatal shooting that claimed the lives of five people at a home near Seattle.

title: Harvey Weinstein Diagnosed With Bone Marrow Cancer: Report
content: Disgraced Hollywood movie producer Harvey Weinstein has been diagnosed with a form of bone marrow cancer, US media reported Monday, a month after he was indicted on a new sex crime charge.
summary: Disgraced Hollywood movie producer Harvey Weinstein has been diagnosed with a form of bone marrow cancer, US media reported Monday, a month after he was indicted on a new sex crime charge.

title: "India Values Close Cooperation Within BRICS": PM Modi Emplanes For Russia
content: India values close cooperation within BRICS which has emerged as an important platform for dialogue and discussion on a range of key issues concerning global developmental agenda, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said on Tuesday.
summary: India values close cooperation within BRICS which has emerged as an important platform for dialogue and discussion on a range of key issues concerning global developmental agenda, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said on Tuesday.

title: Italian Surfer, 36, Dies After Being Impaled By Swordfish In Indonesia
content: 36-year-old Italian surfer Giulia Manfrini has died after being fatally impaled by a swordfish during a freak incident in Indonesia.
summary: 36-year-old Italian surfer Giulia Manfrini has died after being fatally impaled by a swordfish during a freak incident in Indonesia.

title: Kamala Harris, Donald Trump Pick Up Pace In Final Stages Of US Election
content: As the election draws closer, Kamala Harris has been sharpening her attacks on Donald Trump's fitness for office, often calling him "unstable" or "unhinged".
summary: As the election draws closer, Kamala Harris has been sharpening her attacks on Donald Trump's fitness for office, often calling him "unstable" or "unhinged".

title: "Managed Main Source Of Income": Israel Kills Hezbollah Finance Chief
content: The Israeli army said Monday that the latest commander responsible for funding the Lebanese Hezbollah group was "eliminated" in Syria.
summary: The Israeli army said Monday that the latest commander responsible for funding the Lebanese Hezbollah group was "eliminated" in Syria.

title: 59 People In Hong Kong Tricked Into Undressing During Video Chats
content: According to the police, the scam typically involves extortionists - often women - luring male victims into undressing during video chats and then secretly recording the acts.
summary: According to the police, the scam typically involves extortionists - often women - luring male victims into undressing during video chats and then secretly recording the acts.

title: Liam Payne Had "Multiple" Drugs In His System At The Time Of Death: Report
content: British pop star and former One Direction member Liam Payne had a toxic mixture of drugs in his system at the time of his death in Argentina last week, ABC News reported, citing a toxicology report.
summary: British pop star and former One Direction member Liam Payne had a toxic mixture of drugs in his system at the time of his death in Argentina last week, ABC News reported, citing a toxicology report.

title: Hamas Attack Survivor Dies By Suicide On 22nd Birthday, Family Cites PTSD
content: Shirel Golan's family blamed Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu-led Israeli government for turning a blind eye to Hamas attack survivors.
summary: Shirel Golan's family blamed Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu-led Israeli government for turning a blind eye to Hamas attack survivors.

title: "Wrong Choice": Ukraine Slams UN Chief For Accepting Invite To BRICS Summit
content: Ukraine's Foreign Ministry blasted UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres for what it said was his acceptance of an invitation from Russian President Vladimir Putin to a BRICS summit, while staying away from a "peace summit" on the war in Ukraine.
summary: Ukraine's Foreign Ministry blasted UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres for what it said was his acceptance of an invitation from Russian President Vladimir Putin to a BRICS summit, while staying away from a "peace summit" on the war in Ukraine.

title: Israel Claims It Found $500 Million In "Secret" Hezbollah Bunker In Beirut
content: Israel on Monday said it has declassified intelligence which claims the presence of a secret Hezbollah financial hub beneath a Beirut hospital. According to the Israel Defense Forces (IDF), the bunker contained hundreds of millions of dollars in cash
summary: Israel on Monday said it has declassified intelligence which claims the presence of a secret Hezbollah financial hub beneath a Beirut hospital. According to the Israel Defense Forces (IDF), the bunker contained hundreds of millions of dollars in cash

title: US Rapper Sean Diddy Drugged And Raped 13-Year-Old Girl, Lawsuit Claims
content: Sean "Diddy" Combs, who is currently in federal custody following multiple charges of racketeering and sex trafficking, has now been accused of raping a 13-year-old girl with the help of two other celebrities at a 2000 MTV VMAs afterparty.
summary: Sean "Diddy" Combs, who is currently in federal custody following multiple charges of racketeering and sex trafficking, has now been accused of raping a 13-year-old girl with the help of two other celebrities at a 2000 MTV VMAs afterparty.

title: NDTV World Summit Live: India's G20 Sherpa, British Envoy To Speak On Day 2
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi opened the "NDTV World Summit 2024 - The India Century" on Monday.

title: Iran Says US Will Bear "Full Responsibility" For Israeli Retaliation
content: Iran on Monday warned the United States would bear "full responsibility" in case of a retaliatory attack by Israel on the Islamic Republic, after US President Joe Biden indicated he was aware of Israeli plans to do so.
summary: Iran on Monday warned the United States would bear "full responsibility" in case of a retaliatory attack by Israel on the Islamic Republic, after US President Joe Biden indicated he was aware of Israeli plans to do so.

title: Blinken Heads To Middle East As Israel Intensifies Strikes In Lebanon
content: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken left for the Middle East Monday on a new push for an elusive Gaza ceasefire two weeks before US elections, seeing a new opportunity from Israel's killing of Hamas's leader.
summary: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken left for the Middle East Monday on a new push for an elusive Gaza ceasefire two weeks before US elections, seeing a new opportunity from Israel's killing of Hamas's leader.

title: 85 Indians Discharged From Russian Military Ahead Of BRICS Summit
content: Eighty-five Indian nationals have been discharged from the Russian military so far and efforts are on to secure the release of 20 more Indians, Foreign Secretary Vikram Misri said on Monday.
summary: Eighty-five Indian nationals have been discharged from the Russian military so far and efforts are on to secure the release of 20 more Indians, Foreign Secretary Vikram Misri said on Monday.

title: Lebanon Says Child Among 4 Killed As Israel Strikes Near Beirut Hospital
content: Lebanon said four people including a child were killed Monday in Israeli air strikes near the country's biggest public hospital close to south Beirut, with state media reporting over a dozen raids.
summary: Lebanon said four people including a child were killed Monday in Israeli air strikes near the country's biggest public hospital close to south Beirut, with state media reporting over a dozen raids.
